channel.title: Reaping-Scape
channel.description:
[size=24pt]RuneScape Demon Wars[/size]
[size=12pt]My latest project.[/size]
[size=10pt]Features:[/size] 1, clan wars (100%) 2, castle wars (90%) 3, god wars dungeon (85%) 4, 5 dimensions (100%) {all npc's add all dimensions} 5, bounty hunter (100% with random drops) 6, fist of guthix (Reaper's lair) {in the cave of FOG are fear reapers that drop 100 to 1000 fog tokens} 7, NEW SUMMONING MONSTERS 8, Duel Arena (90%) {there is a glitch wich makes the client crash} [im trying to fix it]
[size=12pt]Skills:[/size]
[size=10pt]Attack, Defence and strength= 100%[/size]
[size=10pt]Ranged= 90%[/size]
[size=10pt]Magic= 90%[/size] Magic vs player (ancients) = 90% Magic vs player (modern) = 90% (still adding spells) Magic vs Npc (modern, ancients and lunar) = 100& (just wield any staff) {each staff has his own spell effect}
[size=10pt]Prayer= 100%[/size]
[size=10pt]Construction= 100%[/size]
(still bulby based)
[size=10pt]FireMaking= 0%[/size]
(i used firemaking to respawn objects)
[size=10pt]All other skills work perfectly= 100%[/size]
(still buly based)
[size=18pt]NPC SPAWN[/size]
Varrock ( shops are 100%) full npc talk lumbridge (shops are 100%) full npc talk falador (shops are 100%) full npc talk camelot (shops are 100%) full npc talk adrougne (shops are 100%) full npc talk edgville (shops are 100%) full npc talk yannile (shops are being made atm) full npc talk wildy (no shops) yet full npc talk
This server is going to be about the story of the grim reaper
[size=36pt]Pics are comming up[/size]
[size=24pt][color=beige]Release Date: unknown (depends on how much i still have to work.[/color][/size]

item.title: Reaping-Scape
item.dc:creator: @im_not_rich im not rich
item.description:
@im_not_rich wrote:

I3itcher:

You should have the Grim Reaper welcome you to the game when you first login saying something like: “Welcome to Reaping-Scape, Your on your Own Now! Evil Laugh”

I see you’ve got some nice idea’s, maybe you could try setting up your own project ? maybe a good idea? ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Reaping-Scape
item.dc:creator: @skiller009 skiller009
item.description:
@skiller009 wrote:

[size=24pt]RuneScape Demon Wars[/size]

[size=12pt]My latest project.[/size]

[size=10pt]Features:[/size]
1, clan wars (100%)
2, castle wars (90%)
3, god wars dungeon (85%)
4, 5 dimensions (100%) {all npc’s add all dimensions}
5, bounty hunter (100% with random drops)
6, fist of guthix (Reaper’s lair) {in the cave of FOG are fear reapers that drop 100 to 1000 fog tokens}
7, NEW SUMMONING MONSTERS
8, Duel Arena (90%) {there is a glitch wich makes the client crash} [im trying to fix it]

[size=12pt]Skills:[/size]

[size=10pt]Attack, Defence and strength= 100%[/size]

[size=10pt]Ranged= 90%[/size]

[size=10pt]Magic= 90%[/size]
Magic vs player (ancients) = 90%
Magic vs player (modern) = 90% (still adding spells)
Magic vs Npc (modern, ancients and lunar) = 100& (just wield any staff)
{each staff has his own spell effect}

[size=10pt]Prayer= 100%[/size]

[size=10pt]Construction= 100%[/size]

(still bulby based)

[size=10pt]FireMaking= 0%[/size]

(i used firemaking to respawn objects)

[size=10pt]All other skills work perfectly= 100%[/size]

(still buly based)

[size=18pt]NPC SPAWN[/size]

Varrock ( shops are 100%) full npc talk
lumbridge (shops are 100%) full npc talk
falador (shops are 100%) full npc talk
camelot (shops are 100%) full npc talk
adrougne (shops are 100%) full npc talk
edgville (shops are 100%) full npc talk
yannile (shops are being made atm) full npc talk
wildy (no shops) yet full npc talk

This server is going to be about the story of the grim reaper

[size=36pt]Pics are comming up[/size]
